item.title: Protest against ethanol factory: 12 persons arrested in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Protest against ethanol factory: 12 persons arrested in Gadwal
The arrested have been remanded and five others have been issued notices, Rajoli Sub-Inspector Jagadeeshwar said in a video statement
By Telangana Today Published Date - 5 June 2025, 10:34 AM
JOGULAMBA GADWAL: Tension continues to prevail in Pedda Dhanwada village after police arrested 12 persons, including a few farmers on Thursday, in connection with the attack on the proposed ethanol factory on Wednesday.
The arrested have bee...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
